participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and dedicated, Emily loves helping others and is very proud of her daughter's achievements.
participant_1.background: i enjoy going to the park. my favorite movie is friday. i'm a doctor. my daughter is a child prodigy. i'm now looking for a new job.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, James enjoys sharing his love for music and helping those in need.
participant_2.background: i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i play several instruments. i am a piano teacher on the side. i volunteer at the homeless shelter. my father played violin professionally.
